name: arth infosoft pvt. ltd.
overview:
eduWare is a School Management Software developed by â€œArth InfoSoft Pvt. Ltdâ€ to manage day to day school operations easily and efficiently. Its primary aim is to automate all activities related to school, starting from creating trust , schools, configuring school master details, user management, defining term and shift , admission process, scheduling student interview, generating admission waitlist, class design, courseware design, time table generation, holiday calendar, school activity calendar, fee collection, creating examination time table, results generation, result analysis, student/employee attendance, student roll number generation, capturing student and employee digital image, class transfer, student ID card printing, payroll, employee PF deduction and slip generation, employee management, employee leave management, employee transfer, accounting calculations, transportation management, hostel management, material management, sending alerts to parents via SMS/email, starting new and closing existing session, generating leaving certificates and other required activities of school. User can perform these activities with few clicks and minimum entries hence enhance the efficiency level of management and student services to its optimum. We provide more than 100 types of highly customizable reports for each of the above module.

Many of prestigious schools of Gujarat are our major clients and they have rated our software very highly. We provide 24*7 supports via phone/internet/onsite. We have implemented â€œeduWareâ€ in more than 50 schools across India.
